title: Instagram model Nicole Shiraz embroiled in MAFS' Cyrell Paule and Eden Dally's split
text:
An Instagram model has become embroiled in Cyell Paule and Eden Dally's shock split, after meeting the Love Island star earlier this month.

Nicole Shiraz, 24, has been spotted out with Eden, 27, twice this month, with the pair first crossing paths at her Boss Ladies event in Sydney on October 5.

On Saturday, a day after Cyrell, 30, announced her split from Eden, he was seen having a drink with Nicole before they both attended a basketball match.

Shock: Instagram model Nicole Shiraz (left) has become embroiled in Cyell Paule and Eden Dally's (right) shock split, after meeting the Love Island star earlier this month

During their first meeting at the 'ambassador dinner' for Nicole's brand Boss Ladies at Criniti's Woolloomooloo, the pair posed for a picture together.

Eden and Nicole smiled alongside each other and another gentleman.

They then reunited before the Sydney Kings' basketball game at Qudos Bank Arena on Saturday, enjoying a cosy drink with another female.

Nice to meet you! During their first meeting at the 'ambassador dinner' for Nicole's brand Boss Ladies in Woolloomooloo on October 5, the pair posed for a picture together with another man

Twice in a month! They then reunited before the Sydney Kings' basketball game at Qudos Bank Arena on October 26, enjoying a cosy drink with another female

Speaking to Daily Mail Australia on Saturday, Eden confirmed there is nothing at all romantic between the pair - adding that he is merely an ambassador for Boss Ladies.

Boss Ladies is a designer handbag rental service, which Nicole owns.

Nicole did not respond when approached by Daily Mail Australia for comment.

Friends: On Saturday, Eden confirmed there is nothing at all romantic between the pair - adding that he is merely an ambassador for Nicole's brand Boss Ladies. Pictured on October 6

The brunette, who boasts 199,000 Instagram followers, is no stranger to high-profile friendships or being in the spotlight.

Last week, she was photographed on a yacht with American rapper Tyga in Sydney.

Announcing her split from Eden on Friday, a pregnant Cyrell cradled her bump, writing: 'Even if it’s just you and me. We’ll create our own happiness.'

Influencer: The brunette, who boasts 199,000 Instagram followers, is no stranger to high-profile friendships or being in the spotlight
description: Instagram model Nicole Shiraz has become embroiled in Cyell Paule and Eden Dally's shock split, after meeting the Love Island star earlier this month.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
